alert.note: Alert for Arthur; Hooker; Keith; Lincoln; McPherson (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 28 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Arthur, northeastern Keith, southwestern Hooker, northwestern Lincoln and western McPherson Counties through 900 PM CDT/800 PM MDT/... At 800 PM CDT/700 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 17 miles southwest of Tryon, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Big Bald Hill, Bucktail Lake, Sand Beach Lake, Flatts, Big Lamunyon Flats, Diamond Bar Lake, Bucktail, Broganville, Schnick Lake and Calora. This includes the following highways... Highway 61 between mile markers 105 and 108. Highway 92 between mile markers 174 and 200. Highway 97 between mile markers 12 and 21. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT/midnight MDT/ for southwestern and west central Nebraska.
